    Plot KPI objects

    plot.kpi.Rd

    Plot KPI objects

    # S3 method for kpi
plot(x, y = 1, col = "#E6002EFF", pch = 21, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    result from kpi

    y

    ignored

    col

    colour for points

    pch

    point character

    ...

    for possible future expansion

    Value

    list of ggplot objects

    Examples

    # defaults
kpi <- mtcars %>%
  kpi("mpg", by = c("am", "vs"), txt = "MPG")
plot(kpi)
#> $am

#> 
#> $vs

#> 

# customizing the plots
plots <- plot(kpi)

plots$am +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "Foo")
